metadata.title: Variant Management
metadata.summary: This guide provides instructions on how to manage product variants, including adding, deleting, and reordering them. It covers scenarios where the tier structure remains the same and when it changes, providing API request examples for each case.
use_cases: Adding new product variants to an existing product.
Deleting specific product variants that are no longer offered.
Changing the tier structure of product variants.
Reordering the display of product variants.
Updating product information after variant changes.
